## ChartPointerEvent class

Wrapper of `MouseEvent` with position translated into chart coordinate systems.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChartPointerEvent<TEvent extends MouseEvent> implements IChartPointerEvent<TEvent> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IChartPointerEvent](./core.ichartpointerevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;TEvent&gt;
